content:
System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration Namespace

Definition

The System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration namespace provides support for configuration of authentication using extended protection for applications.

In this Article

Classes

ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement

The ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement class represents a configuration element for an ExtendedProtectionPolicy.
ServiceNameElement

The ServiceNameElement class represents a configuration element for a service name used in a ServiceNameElementCollection.
ServiceNameElementCollection

The ServiceNameCollection class is a collection of service principal names that represent a configuration element for an ExtendedProtectionPolicy.
